title: “This telegram must be closely paraphrased before being communicated to anyone”
author: azeemba
aiHeadline: This Telegram Must Be Closely Paraphrased Before Being Communicated to Anyone, Because Apparently Even the Most Obvious Things Need to Be Said in a Way That's Both Vague and Overly Complicated.

title: Google: 'Your $1000 phone needs our permission to install apps now' [video]
author: robtherobber
aiHeadline: Google Says Your $1000 Phone Needs Their Permission to Install Apps Now, Because Apparently Your Phone Isn't Smart Enough to Decide What Apps It Should Have Without a Parental Guidance System.

title: Notes on Managing ADHD
author: amrrs
aiHeadline: Notes on Managing ADHD: Because Who Doesn't Want to Spend Hours Trying to Figure Out How to Stay Focused When Your Brain Is Basically a Toddler with a PhD in Distraction Techniques?

title: Eternal Struggle
author: yurivish
aiHeadline: Eternal Struggle: Because Sometimes It Feels Like You're Just Running in Place on a treadmill That's Going Nowhere, and the Only Thing That's Eternal Is the Feeling of Futility.

title: Jujutsu for everyone
author: Bogdanp
aiHeadline: Jujutsu for Everyone: Because Who Doesn't Want to Learn How to Throw Someone Twice Their Size Across a Room Using Nothing But Their Wits and a Weirdly Effective Knowledge of Human Physiology?
